data.name: DevOpsNG Conference
data.description: DevOps NG | Largest DevOps community in Nigeria | Join thousands of (Software, DevOps, Cloud and Site Reliability) Engineers and IT experts in Africa, Get updated on news and happenings in the community, get must-read articles, chat with like-minded people, get job offers and more.
